pr_title: Make determineImagePullPolicy work with the images with latest-kafka-x.x.x

timeline.message:
Make determineImagePullPolicy work with the images with latest-kafka-X.X.X

Signed-off-by: Jakub Scholz <www@scholzj.com>

timeline.body:
It might be worth modifying line 1051 (the [doc comment](https://github.com/strimzi/strimzi-kafka-operator/pull/2933/files#diff-2a9350887fe59eb3c605753efd97e985R1051)) 
To read something like
```
 *    :latest* results in Always, where * can be any valid tag string, example my-image:latest or my-kafka:latest-kafka-foo.bar.baz
```
timeline.bodyText:
It might be worth modifying line 1051 (the doc comment)
To read something like
 *    :latest* results in Always, where * can be any valid tag string, example my-image:latest or my-kafka:latest-kafka-foo.bar.baz
timeline.bodyHTML:
It might be worth modifying line 1051 (the doc comment)
To read something like

 *    :latest* results in Always, where * can be any valid tag string, example my-image:latest or my-kafka:latest-kafka-foo.bar.baz
timeline.author: samuel-hawker

replies.bodyText: Good catch. I fixed the Javadoc.
replies.author: scholzj
